sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import CategoryContext from '../context/category/categoryContext' const AddCategoryModal = () => { const context = useContext(CategoryContext) const { addCategory } = context const [category, setCategory] = useState({ title: '', image: '' }) const handleChange = e => { setCategory({ ...category, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleAddCategory = async () => { await addCategory(category.title) } return ( <> {/* ADD CATEGORY MODAL */}
Thêm danh mục
) } export default AddCategoryModal
